import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Observable, Subscription } from 'rxjs'; import { AuthService, UserType } from '../../modules/auth'; @Component({ selector: 'app-profile', templateUrl: './profile.component.html', }) export class ProfileComponent implements OnInit { user$: Observable; constructor(private auth: AuthService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.user$ = this.auth.currentUserSubject.asObservable(); } }
